about_the_game:
Combine materials and create countless swords combinations for your clients at the ever burning forge in Smithy Shop. Choose your swords bearers wisely, as every sword counts towards a cause, and you'll soon discover their repercussions, good and bad.

Smithy Shop combines your knowledge of materials with the consequences of your actions, and you can bet they'll be knocking on your door sooner rather than later. Contribute to rid the kingdom of an evil witch, hunt the dragons, save the princess or support cheese over turnips. Your choice matters, and the world will never be the same. Influence the world through your weapons from the comfort of your Smithy Shop!
